data.title: B Long Contest Faultline + Flashpoint
data.description: Combo your utility like so, to gain an advantageous fight towards B Long. This will force Attackers to teleport, or to take a losing engagement.

data.title: Pipes to A Site Flashpoint
data.description: A good flash to blind enemies rushing A site and allow your team a few extra seconds to rotate and set up.

data.title: A Cubby to A Site Flashpoint
data.description: A good flash that you can throw from A Cubby that hits the entire A Site allowing you to peak and get a kill or stop a push.

data.title: B Hall to B Site Aftershock
data.description: This is a good aftershock to kill your opponent that is planting the bomb in the popular planting spot.
